data.text:

Dear network, I would like to inform you briefly that I have been released from my duties as WAB Managing Director since mid-October of this year. ğŸ‘‹ I accept the decision of the WAB Board of Directors, even though I would have liked to continue working for the sustainable development of the offshore wind supply industry in this position. I look back with gratitude on 4.5 years. It has been an honor to me being in position to represent so many competent, innovative and experienced companies and institutes, primarily from the ğŸŒŠâš“offshore wind and maritime industry, but also from the onshore wind industry and from the emerging hydrogen economy. ğŸ™ I am grateful to the WAB team and the WAB e.V. for giving me the opportunity to promote the WAB as the voice of the offshore wind supply industry. My thanks ğŸ™ also go to all member companies, partners, authorities, national and international associations, media representatives, scientists, think tanks and many more. I look forward ğŸ¤— to future challenges ğŸ’ªğŸŒŠâš“ and exciting tasks (I will keep you updated) and to staying in touch with a wonderful ğŸ¤ network: you ğŸ’™! - Seasons greetings ğŸ„ and wonderful relaxing winter days - see you soon. I can't tag everyone, but you are all meant: WindEurope, Verband fÃ¼r Schiffbau und Meerestechnik e.V. (VSM), WORLD FORUM OFFSHORE WIND (WFO), EE.SH Schleswig-Holstein Renewable Energy Network Agency EE.SH, BWO - Bundesverband Windenergie Offshore e.V. , WindEnergy Network e.V.
